_GEng_Sprite_CollisionSet.documentation: Define the collision shape of a Sprite Object
_GEng_Sprite_CollisionSet.label: _GEng_Sprite_CollisionSet(ByRef $hSprite, $iType, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)

params.label: $iType
params.documentation:
Defines which shape to use.
	Can be one of the following:
	* 0 => Dot
	* 1 => Rectangle (AABB)
	* 2 => Circle

params.label: $x
params.documentation:
* 0 => Dot
	- Sprite's relative position of the collision point
* 1 => Rectangle (AABB)
	- Upper left corner of the bounding box (sprites relative)
* 2 => Circle
	- Circle's center point position

params.label: $y
params.documentation:
* 0 => Dot
	- Sprite's relative position of the collision point
* 1 => Rectangle (AABB)
	- Upper left corner of the bounding box (sprites relative)
* 2 => Circle
	- Circle's center point position

params.label: $w
params.documentation:
* 0 => Dot
	- Not used
* 1 => Rectangle (AABB)
	- Size of the bounding box (widht, height)
* 2 => Circle
	- Radius

params.label: $h
params.documentation:
* 0 => Dot
	- Not used
* 1 => Rectangle (AABB)
	- Size of the bounding box (widht, height)
* 2 => Circle
	- Not used

params.label: $hSprite2
params.documentation:
Sprite Object or one of the followings
	* $GEng_ScrBorder_Top -> Upper screen edge
	* $GEng_ScrBorder_Bot -> Bottom screen edge
	* $GEng_ScrBorder_Left -> Left screen edge
	* $GEng_ScrBorder_Right -> Right screen edge

params.label: $iScrBorderPosition
params.documentation: Distance between the screen edge and the collision line

params.label: $iDynamique
params.documentation: If TRUE, then the 2 tested sprites will collide dynamically

params.label: $iPrecision
params.documentation:
Defines the precision of the dynamic collision anti-bugs algorithm,
high values can really slow your program, so increase only if you encounter bugs.

_GEng_Sprite_CollisionScrBorders.documentation: Test collision between a Sprite Object and all screen borders
_GEng_Sprite_CollisionScrBorders.label: _GEng_Sprite_CollisionScrBorders(ByRef $hSprite, $iDynamique = 0)
